title: Academic Management System (AMS)
description: Built a full-stack AMS for IIT Goa to manage academics, marksheets, and course registrations.

title: Messaging and Conversation Web App
description: Developed a real-time chat app using MERN stack and WebSocket for live communication.

title: HomeBudget: Personal Finance Application
description: Created a budget tracking app with React Router and toast notifications for real-time feedback.

title: Health Challenge Tracker
description: Built an Angular SPA to track health challenges with filtering, pagination, and local storage.

title: Document Summarization Pipeline (RAG Model)
description: Summarizes documents using the RAG model by integrating retrieval and generation with Python and Transformers.

title: Artificial Intelligence-Based Pac-Man
description: Created an AI-based Pac-Man agent using search algorithms and reinforcement learning techniques.
